channel.title: Sony Vegas Cut-Out
channel.description:
Hello guys, I think this is the wrong section. I couldn't find the proper one.
In Sony Vegas 9.0 Pro, how do I cut out my account in a recording so it will only be the account and black background?
For example, I recorded an BGS Spec, but you see the background, like grass and that on RS. How do I cut that shit off? :D
Thanks Alot.
